name: Drizzlepath
description: In Drizzlepath you are set on a journey to the top of the Mountain of Fire. It aims to be an atmospheric, relaxed and enigmatic experience. Downloadable soundtrack included.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz or better (multi-core processor is strongly recommended) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA series 400, AMD Radeon HD 6000 Series or better (DirectX 11 minimum) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2240 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core or Six Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX780, AMD Radeon R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2240 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
